posts.title: Getting Started with React 19
posts.body: React 19 introduces new concurrent rendering improvements and enhanced hooks for better performance and DX.

posts.title: Mastering TanStack Query
posts.body: Learn how to use TanStack Query for efficient server state management, caching, and background data fetching.

posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.body: Closures allow functions to access variables from an outer scope even after that scope has closed, enabling powerful patterns.

posts.title: Building REST APIs with Node.js and Express
posts.body: A beginner-friendly guide to creating scalable REST APIs using Express.js, middleware, and routing best practices.

posts.title: Optimizing Frontend Performance
posts.body: Discover techniques like code-splitting, lazy loading, and memoization to make your React applications faster.
